```
$ curl http://localhost:8080
Hello buddy

$ curl http://localhost:8081/actuator/health
{"status":"UP"}
```

```
FROM openjdk:8-jdk-alpine
EXPOSE 8080
EXPOSE 8081
ARG JAR_FILE=target/my-app-0.1.jar
ADD ${JAR_FILE} my-app.jar
ENTRYPOINT ["java","-jar","/my-app.jar"]
```

```
$ docker ps
CONTAINER ID   IMAGE           COMMAND                  CREATED             STATUS              PORTS              NAMES
2debb3c5345b   my-app:latest   "java -jar /my-app.jâ€¦"   5 seconds ago       Up 3 seconds        8080-8081/tcp      myapp
```

```
$ curl http://localhost:8080
curl: (7) Failed to connect to localhost port 8080: Connection refused
```

```
$ curl http://localhost:32773
Hello buddy
$ curl http://localhost:32772/actuator/health
```

```
$ curl http://localhost:80
Hello buddy
$ curl http://localhost:8081/actuator/health
curl: (7) Failed to connect to localhost port 8081: Connection refused
```

```
version: "3.7"
services:
  myapp:
    image: my-app:latest
    ports:
      - 8080
      - 8081
```

```
$ docker-compose up -d
Starting my-app_myapp_1 ... done
$ docker port  my-app_myapp_1
8080/tcp -> 0.0.0.0:32785
8081/tcp -> 0.0.0.0:32784
```

```
version: "3.7"
services:
  myapp:
    image: my-app:latest
    ports:
      - 80:8080
      - 81:8081
```
